------------------Synopsis and Disclaimer-----------------------------------------

Kindred is a magical girl manga based on religious themes.
The journey of two siblings in search for a cure for their dying mother.

**This work isn't intended to offend anyone, I just think bible lore is epic af.**

**"Magical Girl" tag not added because there are not magical girls yet.**

Thank you so much for reading n_n/
